result.eng: He does not care what I did.
result.ga: is cuma leis cad a rinne mé
result.orig: is cuma leis cad a rinne mé
result.html: is cuma leis cad a rinne méHe does not care what I did.
result.ponchtml: is cuma leis cad a rinne méHe does not care what I did.

result.eng: I don't care what people think.
result.ga: is cuma liom cad a cheapann daoine
result.orig: is cuma liom cad a cheapann daoine
result.html: is cuma liom cad a cheapann daoineI don't care what people think.
result.ponchtml: is cuma liom cad a ċeapann daoineI don't care what people think.

result.eng: I don't care about the small technical diffrences.

result.eng: It is my duty to care for the patients.
result.ga: tá cúram na n-othar orm
result.orig: tá cúram na n-othar orm

result.eng: Along with taking care of the child she had to clean the house.
result.ga: fara aire a thabhairt don leanbh bhí uirthi an teach a ghlanadh
result.orig: fara aire a thabhairt don leanbh bhí uirthi an teach a ghlanadh

result.ponchtml: fara aire a ṫaḃairt don leanḃ ḃí uirṫi an teaċ a ġlanaḋAlong with taking care of the child she had to clean the house.

result.eng: All you need to care about is that the old folks are happy.
result.ga: is cuma duitse ach an tseanlánúin a bheith sásta

result.ponchtml: is cuma duitse aċ an tseanlánúin a ḃeiṫ sástaAll you need to care about is that the old folks are happy.

result.eng: All you need to care aboit in this world is to steal in a way the law allows.
